SELECT p.permission_id as permissionid, p.permission_name as permission, p.permission_code as perCode, p.menu_name as menuname, p.menu_code as menucode FROM t_sys_user_group_map ug LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_group_map rg ON ug.group_id = rg.group_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r ON r.role_id = rg.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_permission_map rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_permission p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id
WHERE ug.user_id = #{userId} ;
